1199890.name: Robozarro - Soundtrack
1199890.description:
Robozarro's Soundtrack was written and produced by Nicole Marie T. The soundtrack includes 18 tracks, spanning approximately 30 minutes.

(Minor Robozarro Spoilers in the Track List below!)

Track List:
  • 1) Title Screen (Robozarro)
  • 2) City Streets (Mech Angeles)
  • 3) Fix & Chips
  • 4) Sewers Main Theme
  • 5) Sewers Mini Boss
  • 6) Sewers Big Boss (Chunks)
  • 7) Ro-Tek Main Theme
  • 8) Ro-Tek Mini Boss
  • 9) Ro-Tek Big Boss
  • 10) Lab Main Theme
  • 11) Lab Mini Boss
  • 12) Lab Big Boss (P44)
  • 13) The Garden Main Theme
  • 14) The Garden Mini Boss
  • 15) The Garden Big Boss (Monitor)
  • 16) Roofs Main Theme
  • 17) Grandma's House
  • 18) Party Time With Fix & Chips
